item.title: List crontab for all users
item.description: for user in $(cut -f1 -d: /etc/passwd); do echo $user; crontab -u $user -l; done for user in $(cut -f1 -d: /etc/passwd); do echo $user; crontab -u $user -l; done

item.title: Own IRC Server on Debian
item.description: aptitude install ircd-irc2 nano /etc/ircd/ircd.conf M:irc.<HOSTNAME>::<COUNTRY>::000A A:<NAME>:<EMAIL>::<COMPANYNAME>: Y:1:90::100:512000:5.5:100.100 Y:2:90::300:512000:5.5:250.250 I:*:::0:1 I:127.0.0.1/32:::0:1 I:192.168.0.0/24::::0:2 P::::6667: nano /etc/ircd/ircd.motd Your welcome text /etc/init.d/ircd restart
